class Solution:
    def waysToReachStair(self, k: int) -> int:
        arr = []
        ck = k
        
        start = 1
        
        res = 0
        
        
        
        while ck:
            arr += [ck&1]
            ck >>= 1
            
        arr = arr[::-1]
        
        cnt = 0
        add = 0
        
        while True:
            if 1 + add >= k and 1 + add - cnt - 1 <= k:
                need = add + start - k 
                print(cnt, need)
                res += math.comb(cnt+1, need)
            if 1+add - cnt - 1 > k:
                break
            cnt += 1
            add <<= 1
            add += 1
        return res
